Text.Page:
, it's me, Yasring.

I've been hearing news of you from researchers at the Mysterium. I hope you're doing well.

I'm keeping up my research at {@Rgn:45001$$Thrallhold}. The sights here used to be spectacular, especially the sky, but that's all gone since the argons appeared.

Malachai's research helped out greatly, but there's still a lot left in question. , I need your help.

I've enclosed a teleport scroll with this letter. Please join me at {@Rgn:45001$$Thrallhold}.

â€”YasringClose the letter.
